thread.title: John Krasinski to star in off-Broadway play this spring
thread.title_full: John Krasinski to star in off-Broadway play this spring

title: John Krasinski to star in off-Broadway play this spring
text:
> Entertainment John Krasinski to star in off-Broadway play this spring FILE - In this Aug. 13, 2015 file photo, John Krasinski arrives at The Hollywood Foreign Press Association's Annual Grants Banquet in Beverly Hills, Calif. The off-Broadway Public Theater said Thursday, Oct. 1, that Krasinski will make his theatrical debut in playwright Sarah Burgess’s “Dry Powder,” which has a behind-the-scenes look inside a private equity firm. (Photo by John Salangsang/Invision/AP, File) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
